content: it s always fun to knit socks and i usually like to try out new ideas to make them more interesting - especially if it makes the self-striping sock yarn stand out in an interesting manner and since i really like to work with short row here s another way to use them for socks - to create a diagonal stripe please not that this is **not a complete row-by-row knitting pattern** but a rough sketch to enable you to knit a similar pair for yourself it assumes that you have a good idea of how to knit socks and especially that you know how to do a heel
